sentence.text: Before and after eight weeks daily treatment with six capsules of F&amp;V juice concentrate or placebo, peripheral blood gene expression (microarray, quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR)), plasma tumour necrosis factor (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II)Î± (enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA)), body composition (Dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry (DEXA)) and lipid profiles were assessed.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
